dialogue.introduction: The fleet's idol, Naka-chan!Nice to meet you!
dialogue.library_intro: Selected as the Centre of the 4thDesRon, it's Naka-chan! Doing lots of work, from guarding transports to doing the Tokyo Express from Truk... Eh? Was it a Provincial tour, you ask? That is SO not what I was doing!
dialogue.secretary3: Naka-chan belongs to everyone, so don't touch her too much, okay?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hrm. The next job's location.. wha, today's an off day... I see...
dialogue.wedding: Thank you for all the support! I'm gonna work really, really hard for the Admiral! Kira~nâ˜†
dialogue.show_players_score: You've got a call from work, Admiral!
dialogue.equipment2: I've become more and more charming! Kyaha~
dialogue.supply: Craft service, yeah? Time to ea~t!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Don't look at the backstage, okay?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I will be off for a while~! Good night.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new shipdaughter has came~ I can't wait to see her~
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Job is done! Thanks for your hard work!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Naka-chan is sortieing to the scene~
dialogue.battle_start: My skin gets all rough on location~
dialogue.night_battle: Naka-chan's the centre! The number one highlight!
dialogue.mvp: Even if the game is boring, please don't hate Naka-chan!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: It hurts! i told you, it hurts!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Even if it is so, Naka-chan will not swerve from her path!
dialogue.sunk: Eh? Naka is sinking? Sinking... is not a setting an idol should be in...
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Even in the Rainy Season, Naka-chan is definitely the center! Naka-chan teruteru-bouzu is, of course, the center too!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: It's summer! Summer! The summer of Naka-chan's summer concert! Alright, I'm gonna sing! My costume! My costume!
dialogue.christmas_2015: The turkey and the Christmas cake are both delicious!
